about_the_game:
Allows you to change the battle music to tracks from Devil May Cry 3. Use the Gallery > Jukebox option to change music (available after starting mission 2).

Track 1: Battle-1 (Dante battle theme)
Track 2: Vergil Battle-2 (Vergil boss battle theme)
Track 3: Devils Never Cry (end credits theme)

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains strong langauge, violence and nudity.
